basic.description: A review of the tectonic origin and filling of various types of sedimentary basins, followed by an examination of the diagenesis of siliciclastic, carbonate and rganic sediments, and the implications for the occurrence of hydrocarbons and mineral deposits. (1.5 credit units). Prerequisite: GEOL 238* or equivalent; GEOL 365* or equivalent
basic.subject: GEOL
basic.title: Basin Analysis and Economics Deposits
